snippet: Parliament voted to allow the prosecution of Ilias Kassidiaris, 32, a leading ultra-right lawmaker, for assaulting two female leftist politicians during a live TV talk show.
abstract: Greek Parliament votes overwhelmingly to allow prosecution of leading ultra-right lawmaker Ilias Kassidiaris for assaulting two female politicians during live TV talk show.
lead_paragraph: Parliament voted to allow the prosecution of Ilias Kassidiaris, 32, a leading ultra-right lawmaker, for assaulting two female leftist politicians during a live TV talk show.

headline.main: Greece: Vote Allows Prosecution of Lawmaker Over Assault
headline.print_headline: Greece: Vote Allows Prosecution Of Lawmaker Over Assault
